content: crocheted book cover in drops safran the piece is worked in granny squares pattern e-386 yarn group a theme valentine #dropsbindingromance **size** fits book-size width/height/spine 13 x 18 x 2 cm for other sizes read crochet tip **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio 50 g colour 71 marzipan 50 g colour 66 mustard 50 g colour 70 sweet orchid 50 g colour 75 magenta 50 g colour 12 peach the cover weighs approx 58 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 2 5 mm **crochet gauge** 28 treble crochets in width and 16 row in height with hook size 2 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm one square measures approx 4 5 x 4 5 cm
